description: Searches for profiles within a specific domain using one or more predefined search keys (e.g., _fullName, _phone, _email, _account, etc.) and/or custom-defined search keys. A search key is a data type pair that consists of a KeyName and Values list. This operation supports searching for profiles with a minimum of 1 key-value(s) pair and up to 5 key-value(s) pairs using either AND or OR logic.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects returned per page. The default is 20 if this parameter is not included in the request.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: KeyName
parameters.description: A searchable identifier of a customer profile. The predefined keys you can use to search include: _account, _profileId, _assetId, _caseId, _orderId, _fullName, _phone, _email, _ctrContactId, _marketoLeadId, _salesforceAccountId, _salesforceContactId, _salesforceAssetId, _zendeskUserId, _zendeskExternalId, _zendeskTicketId, _serviceNowSystemId, _serviceNowIncidentId, _segmentUserId, _shopifyCustomerId, _shopifyOrderId.

parameters.name: AdditionalSearchKeys
parameters.description: A list of AdditionalSearchKey objects that are each searchable identifiers of a profile. Each AdditionalSearchKey object contains a KeyName and a list of Values associated with that specific key (i.e., a key-value(s) pair). These additional search keys will be used in conjunction with the LogicalOperator and the required KeyName and Values parameters to search for profiles that satisfy the search criteria. (dict) --- A data type pair that consists of a KeyName and Values list that is used in conjunction with the KeyName and Values parameters to search for profiles using the SearchProfiles API. A searchable identifier of a customer profile. A list of key values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: KeyName
nested_params.description: A searchable identifier of a customer profile.

parameters.name: LogicalOperator
parameters.description: Relationship between all specified search keys that will be used to search for profiles. This includes the required KeyName and Values parameters as well as any key-value(s) pairs specified in the AdditionalSearchKeys list. This parameter influences which profiles will be returned in the response in the following manner: AND - The response only includes profiles that match all of the search keys. OR - The response includes profiles that match at least one of the search keys. The OR relationship is the default behavior if this parameter is not included in the request.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The list of Profiles matching the search criteria.

nested_items.name: ProfileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a customer profile.

nested_items.description: An account number that you have given to the customer.

(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FoundByItems
nested_items.description: A list of items used to find a profile returned in a SearchProfiles response. An item is a key-value(s) pair that matches an attribute in the profile.

AND - The profile included in the response matched all of the search keys specified in the request. The FoundByItems will include all of the key-value(s) pairs that were specified in the request (as this is a requirement of AND search logic).
OR - The profile included in the response matched at least one of the search keys specified in the request. The FoundByItems will include each of the key-value(s) pairs that the profile was found by.

nested_items.name: PartyTypeString
nested_items.description: An alternative to PartyType which accepts any string as input.

nested_items.name: GenderString
nested_items.description: An alternative to Gender which accepts any string as input.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token from the previous SearchProfiles API call.
